name: Cat Cafe 5000
description:
In this local co-op game 2-4 players battle to the end of their nine lives. Blast your opponents with your paint gun to change their colour, making them take damage if they aren't standing on their new colour. Grab paint balls to change the colour you're shooting, and power-ups to get an edge over your opponents.

This game was made in 48hrs at NSI Game Jam 14. The theme for the game jam was rainbows.

The Team

  • Annabelle Macfarlane - Artist
  • Millie Prevedoros - Artist
  • Sam Evans - Programmer
